chapter.title: Adding and Updating Data in the &PRODUCTABBR; Data Store
chapter.para: There are two ways to add and update data in the &PRODUCTABBR; Data Store:

listitem.para: Perform small-scale updates, to one or a few records at one time, using the &PRODUCTABBR; Dashboard or a similar application if there's one available. This documentation covers the administrative task of configuring the Dashboard in .

Import many records in a single operation using the &PRODUCTABBR; data ingestion process. This is designed to handle several thousand data records from several files in a single operation. Setting up and peforming an ingestion is handled by an &OPERATORROLE;, and the instructions and reference for this task are included in the &PRODUCTABBR; Runbook available from the &COMPANYABBR;.
